Title: Steer Clear of the Beer Here
Description:
Someone left some beer out up on the southern rise and now the sprites have developed a taste for our brew. They've been sneaking into town all morning, stealing whatever kegs they find.

Bring back what you can. A pandaren worker without brew is just... it won't be very productive. We need the men in good spirits.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return to Mayor Shiyo at Mistfall Village in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
